channel.title: I want to change the emotes
channel.description:
I want to change the emotes they look like this: [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/emotes1.jpg[/img] and I want them to look like this: [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/emotes.jpg[/img] anyone got an idea on how to do this?because I am making Mupescape v2 and I wanted it to look almost like mupescape v1 but just more new items and looks alot better
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 06, 2007, 05:44:00 AM[/size][hr]will anyone help me please...forgot the other stuff for now I just want to know how to get the Bank there

item.title: I want to change the emotes

item.source: I want to change the emotes

item.title: I want to change the emotes
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

[quote=“cwg452003, post:2, topic:149462”]Search for

update();

Directly under that add

sendFrame126("@red@Bank", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("@red@Train",181); sendFrame126("@red@Heal", 178); sendFrame126("@red@Jad",175); sendFrame126("@red@Shop",177); sendFrame126("@red@Wildy",182); sendFrame126("@red@Admins",185); sendFrame126("@red@MB",186); [/quote]You mean directly OVER that.

Read full topic

item.title: I want to change the emotes
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

You need to click save and compile lol?

  1. If that doesnt work go on your server right click the emote and it should say a number e.g. 169 search for that or search for the emote Like “laugh” and if you need help ill tell you how to make them go places.

Read full topic

item.title: I want to change the emotes
item.dc:creator: @Tyy_yyT Tyy/yyT
item.description:
@Tyy_yyT wrote:

You can then change the function of the emotion tab by search the case identification. You could also search the following.

// Yes

If that doesn’t work try.

//Yes

item.title: I want to change the emotes
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Search for

update();

Directly under that add

sendFrame126("@red@Bank", 180);//first emote slot sendFrame126("@red@Train",181); sendFrame126("@red@Heal", 178); sendFrame126("@red@Jad",175); sendFrame126("@red@Shop",177); sendFrame126("@red@Wildy",182); sendFrame126("@red@Admins",185); sendFrame126("@red@MB",186);
